# NSComparisonPredicate.Modifier.any

**Case**

A predicate to match with any entry in the destination of a to-many relationship.

## Declaration

```swift
case any
```

## Discussion

The left hand side must be a collection. The corresponding predicate compares each value in the left hand side against the right hand side and returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when it finds the first match—or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if no match is found

## Constants

- **NSComparisonPredicate.Modifier.direct**: A predicate to compare directly the left and right hand sides.
- **NSComparisonPredicate.Modifier.all**: A predicate to compare all entries in the destination of a to-many relationship.
